overview: Step dad Greg Riley gives step son Johnny Hunter a blowjob to help reduce some stress. Johnny then gives Greg a blowjob before they fuck. While Cody Moore looks around his parents' room he discovers a drawer full of sex toys. Curiously, he tries some of the toys when suddenly his stepdad Jack Andy walks in and shows him how to use them properly. Bryce Kent is not getting along with his stepdad Riley Mitchel. He blames him for the divorce of his parents... or maybe he's just jealous of his father and he's been lusting after Riley. His stepfather takes things in hands and makes a move. We don't know if it's going to make the situation easier, but it will definitely make it spicier. Adrian Rose is in the locker room worrying about his body hair but his stepdad coach Killian Knox has the solution for him. Watch Dont' Tell Your Dad! as Killian give Adrian a little trim before they fuck each other right there in the locker room.
title: Don't Tell Your Dad!
